title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 310 - Reporting Of Injuries By Employers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 310 - Reporting Of Injuries By Employers

State Regulations
§ 310.1 - Penalties for refusal or neglect of an employer to file a report of injury
§ 310.2 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 310

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 20[2][j], 25[8], 110, 117, 141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
